summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the 1973 Budget of the Engineering Department, increasing certain objects of expenditure and program categories in the Engineering Department Operating Fund in order to effectuate payment through such fund of obligations incurred during 1973 in the implementation of programs authorized and funded by appropriations made by Ordinances 101999, 102069, 102378 and 102681; and making certain transfers within said Budget to effectuate payment of certain other obligations incurred in 1973.
